comments.author: Killerassel.2197
comments.body:
Hi.

I may have overlooked something, but as far as I understand /character/â€¦/backstory it only includes the *back*story, i.e. the questions on character creation. Pull request 300 describes a /stories endpoint, but no mention of a connection between character and the story chapters they played.

How can I find out from the API which of my characters is still eligible for rewards of a living story episode?
